titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Jacques J. Bronfenbrenner papers, Rockefeller Institute for Medical Research Scientific Staff FA149
titlestmt.author: Gladys Lewis

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-08-05 00:16:49 -0400.

change.item: Paper finding aid converted to EAD/XML by AureXus in 2010. Imported into the Archvists’ Toolkit by Becky Robbins.

did.unittitle: Jacques J. Bronfenbrenner papers, Rockefeller Institute for Medical Research Scientific Staff

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted pending permission from Rockefeller University.

did.unittitle: [A. Besredka] /S. Flexner. re Bronfenbrenner. In French
Exchange between Henry James and J. Bronfenbrenner re Fred Kimmer

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence from June 16-20 re James objection to handling of Kimmer's departure from RIMR and outlining preferred procedures. Also includes correspondence re Kimmer's return to RIMR in 1914.

did.unittitle: Bronfenbrenner/James. re lantern slides and floor plans
Exchange between Bronfenbrenner, Henry James and Lee, Higginson & Co. re investments for Dr. Bronfenbrenner
Exchange between Bronfenbrenner, H. James and Lee, Higginson & Co. re investments and on 7 Jan re Fred Kimmer's arrival at RIMR
Exchange between H. James and Bronfenbrenner re additional staff for Bronfenbrenner
Exchange between Bronfenbrenner/E.B. Smith re purchase of rabbits
Exchange between H. James, Bronfenbrenner and Lee, Higginson & Co. re investments
Bronfenbrenner/H. James re monkeys w/E.B. Smith reply of July 15
Bronfenbrenner/James re Theobald Smith
Bronfenbrenner/H. Goepper re chemist to head Chemical Dept w/7 Dec reply
Exchange between Bronfenbrenner, H. James and Lee, Higginson & Co. re investments
did.unitdate: 1915 April 6 1915 September 10-23 1915 October 5-6 1915 December 9-22 1916 April 20 1916 May 1-31 1916 June 3

did.unittitle: Exchange between Bronfenbrenner and James re Effie L. MacDonald
Bronfenbrenner/James. re Dr. Ingebrigtsen's address and employment of women from the Margaret Morrison School for Women, Pittsburgh, Pa w/Henry James reply, Sept 10
Exchange between Bronfenbrenner, James and Lee, Higginson & Co. re investments

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes: 1917 April 17. Telegram. Bronfenbrenner/James re Bronfenbrenner becoming U.S. citizen in 1914.

did.unittitle: H.W. Reynolds/H. James, rereference for Bronfenbrenner's apartment rental in Brookline, Mass. w/ H. James reply, May 7
Bronfenbrenner/H. James, re Noguchi illness w/James reply, 17 Sept
Bronfenbrenner/H. James, re James resignation from RI and Bronfenbrenner investments to be handled by Mr. Greene, new RIMR Business Manager
Exchange between Bronfenbrenner, H.L. Amoss and E.B. Smith, re purchase of rats and RI supplying rats to Dr. Bronfenbrenner
Exchange between Bronfenbrenner and S. Flexner re George De Bard
Bronfenbrenner/S. Flexner. re Bronfenbrenner's tentative appointment by RIMR, Board of Directors and Esther Greisheimer. Handwritten
Bronfenbrenner/L. Emmett Holt. Acknowledges appointment to RIMR from Sept 1923 - June 1925

Exchange between Bronfenbrenner, Simon Flexner and E.B. Smith re arrangements for shipping to and storage of Bronfenbrenner's reprints, books, etc and care of laboratory and glassware by Jeanette McNaught, and approval of Ware Cattell, (Prof. Cattell's son) to work in Bronfenbrenner's laboratory at RIMR
Bronfenbrenner/S. Flexner, (copy). re Paul Kreider, R.N. Klemer, David H. Flashman and Mary Jane Hogue
Bronfenbrenner/Wm. A. White & Sons re apartment in Socony Hall
Bronfenbrenner/E.B. Smith re supply of media for work on bacteriophage
E.B. Smith/Bronfenbrenner re Ralph S. Muckenfuss appointment from 1925 June to 1926 June 20

Bronfenbrenner/S. Flexner and Secretary, re invitation to Bronfenbrenner by E.O. Jordan to give summer course in bacteriology at the University of Chicago w/copy of E.O. Jordan's letter, dated 21 Jan attached and S. Flexner's approval and RIMR Bd of Scientific Directors granting leave to give course
Bronfenbrenner/Flexner re applicants: Dr. Bencowitz, Dr. Hetler, Dr. D.M. Grayzel, and Dr. Oscar Bodansky w/Flexner reply
Bronfenbrenner/S. Flexner re purchase of centrifuge and furnace w/Flexner reply
Bronfenbrenner/Flexner re centrifuge, Seitz filters and electric furnace w/printed flyer describing Seitz Germicide filters by Empire Laboratory Supply Co.
Bronfenbrenner/Flexner re laboratory space at Woods Hole
Bronfenbrenner/E.B. Smith re laboratory space at woods Hole, outlining work to be done
Hennessy Realty Co. /RIMR re reference request for apartment rental by Bronfenbrenner w/E.B. Smith's reply
Walter R. Eimer (Eimer and Amend) /RIMR re measurements and specifications of Ultra Filter designed by Bronfenbrenner
Bronfenbrenner/Flexner. Biographical and professional information re Bronfenbrenner w/corrections on attachments

E.B. Smith/Bronfenbrenner re space at Woods Hole for summer work and request for letter of resignation from RIMR by Bronfenbrenner to new appointment at Washington University School of Medicine, St. Louis, Mo. w/Bronfenbrenner's handwritten reply, dated June 10

re J.J. Bronfenbrenner's appointment as Director, Dept of Bacteriology and Immunology, Washington University School of Medicine, beginning September 1928 and RIMR gifting of special apparatus used by Bronfenbrenner to Washington University School of Medicine
St. Louis, Mo. Post Dispatch, "Washington University Names Bacteriology Head". Newspaper clipping
Inventory of apparatus to Washington University Medical School
McKim Marriott, Dean of Washington University School of Medicine/S. Flexner. Accepting gift of apparatus
E.B. Smith/Bronfenbrenner re May 29, St. Louis, Mb. Globe Democrat clipping
Exchange between E.W. Smillie and Bernard Lupinek re letter to Bronfenbrenner

Exchange between Bronfenbrenner, Associated Press, E.B. Smith and Louis Schmidt, re publication of Bronfenbrenner work on bacteriophage while at RIMR, presented to Society of American Bacteriologists, at Ames, Iowa meeting of AAAS w/photograph of Bronfenbrenner, by Associated Press

Exchange between S. Flexner, J. Bronfenbrenner, M.S. Soule and E.B. Smith re Bronfenbrenner's presentation of a paper on bacteriophage work conducted and published at RIMR at 1930 July 20-25, Paris, 1st International Congress of Microbiology and travel grant by RIMR to assist Bronfenbrenner's travel expense to meeting
Exchange between Bronfenbrenner, Henry S. Pritchett (TIAA), A.D. Robertson and E.B. Smith re disposal of policies under the plan of TIAA for Bronfenbrenner
Exchange between Bronfenbrenner and Bernard Lupinek re Dr. Haford relocating from St. Louis to New York to work w/Dr. Olitsky
Exchange between Bronfenbrenner, Max Theiler, W.R. Flinn and Conrad Hon re supplying Bronfenbrenner with guinea pigs from Max Theiler's special stock maintained at RI
Financial statements/records
Bronfenbrenner financial records. In Account w/Lee, Higginson & Co.
Statements from Lee, Higginson & Co.
Archives Washington University School of Medicine Library. Guide to Jacques J. Bronfenbrenner Papers, 1909-1953.
